thm pjhtheu2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), c0), wcel(c0, cch))
  ococ(c0)
  rexbidva(s1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))), wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cva, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))

blocks.name: pjpjhth
blocks.content: Projection Theorem: Any Hilbert space vector ` A ` can be decomposed into a member ` x ` of a closed subspace ` H ` and a member ` y ` of the complement of the subspace. Theorem 3.7(i) of [Beran] p. 102 (existence part). (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjpjhth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cfv(cort, c0), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c0), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))))
  axpjcl(c0, c1)

  axpjpj(c0, c1)
  rspceov(s0, s1, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), cfv(cort, c0), c1, cva)

thm pjpjhth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(s0[+h]s1))), ((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ c0, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)∈(_|_ ` c0), c1 =(((projh ` c0)` c1)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)))
  axpjcl(c0, c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)∈(_|_ ` c0), (_|_ ` c0)∈ CH)
  choccl(c0)
  axpjcl((_|_ ` c0), c1)
  axpjpj(c0, c1)
  rspceov(s0, s1, ((projh ` c0)` c1), c0, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1), (_|_ ` c0), c1, cva)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (projh ` c0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpjh, c0)
  diff.cpjh.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c0)
  diff.cort.s(s0)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (projh ` c0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpjh, c0)
